products.title: Serenity Natural Voile  Roller Blind
products.description: The lovely pale creamy tones of the serenity natural are fresh and light, the cream is subtle and will complement and harmonise with any colour palette. This blind is the perfect modern solution to providing natural light yet privacy too. The voile allows soft light to infuse the lovely pale creamy tones of the serenity natural are fresh and light, the cream is subtle and will complement and harmonise with any colour palette.

products.title: Serenity Cloud White Voile Roller Blind
products.description: Net curtains are so last century. But if you want to reserve your privacy, what you really need is a voile roller blind such as this. The serenity cloud white voile blind is a wonderful choice; the colour is soft white and the open weave gives it a magical and calming quality net curtains are so last century.

products.title: Beauvoir Silver Leaf Blackout Roller Blind
products.description: This beauvoir silver leaf roller blind is so refined. It has a delicate blossom pattern that is subtle and ever so sophisticated and is picked out in gorgeous grey tones that suit modern decors down to the ground. The blackout fabric will keep your home well protected and beautif this beauvoir silver leaf roller blind is so refined.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Beige Roller Blind
products.description: This roller blind is light beige, think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour at the window. This contemporary colour won't look out of place in either modern settings or this roller blind is light beige, think of an extremely milky coffee.

products.title: Argyle Blackout Parchment Roller Blind
products.description: Take one rich cream blind and then add a beautiful leafy pattern and you can create a beautiful kitchen or bathroom space in one fell swoop. products.title: Hibernia Pewter Roller Blind
products.description: This hibernia pewter roller blind is as smart as they come. It's picked out in a lovely warm greyish neutral tone that will add some real depth and presence to your window. The fabric has a faint pattern to give it that designer look and is made out of hardwearing pvc to offer bl this hibernia pewter roller blind is as smart as they come.

products.title: Dartford Blackout Birch Roller Blind
products.description: This beautiful dartford birch roller blind can go anywhere in your home, such is its versatility. It's made from hardwearing pvc so even tough environments like kitchens and bathrooms aren't off limits. The stylish fabric has a speckled look, with a lovely off-white complemented this beautiful dartford birch roller blind can go anywhere in your home, such is its versatility.

products.title: Dartford Blackout Oatmeal Roller Blind
products.description: Neutral is one of those colour groups that we simply all go for. It's calming, it's simple and it's wholly versatile. Plus pair it with a robust waterproof fabric, and you've got yourself a winner. That's exactly what you get with the dartford oatmeal roller blind. Made from inc neutral is one of those colour groups that we simply all go for.

products.title: Dartford Blackout Smoke Roller Blind
products.description: Practical doesn't have to mean unpretty. This dartford smoke roller blind has everything rolled into one. 100% waterproof fabric suitable for a bathroom, check. Blackout fabric for extra privacy, sorted. Subtle texture for a trendy look, you got it. Then there's the colour. A tr practical doesn't have to mean unpretty.

products.title: Polemis Ash Flame Retardant Roller Blind
products.description: This polemis ash blind is the picture of sophistication with its lovely mid-grey tone. But the fun doesnt stop there, its also made from strong stuff. The fabric is flame retardant, bringing you safety and peace of mind. Its also moisture resistant, making it a doddle to wi this polemis ash blind is the picture of sophistication with its lovely mid-grey tone.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Fantasy Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The blue here has a wonderful depth and warmth but still manages to have a touch of brightness about it too. A fantastic choice for rooms which have touches of blue and need a nice solid block of colour at the window. The cordoba blackout fabric has a high quality finish w the blue here has a wonderful depth and warmth but still manages to have a touch of brightness about it too.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Italian Roast Roller Blind
products.description: Picture that italian coffee. Here the dark brown colour is just as lovely and sophisticated, this blind will offer a crisp look with a real contemporary edge. As with all browns, this blind will look fabulous with both neutrals and a scheme that uses more colour, as its bl picture that italian coffee.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Slate Roller Blind
products.description: This blind is very dark grey, it borders on black but not quite. The colour is very chic and will look great in a minimalist setting or one that works a monochrome look. Although this blind is a dark colour it has a muted tone guaranteeing that it will look reserved and sophi this blind is very dark grey, it borders on black but not quite.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Scarlet Roller Blind
products.description: The cordoba scarlet blackout roller blind is a bright red tone, just like a ripe tomato or fiery chilli. This blind will make a real statement hanging at the window. If you want to create a lively look then this blind is the one for you and we can see it sitting nicely with o the cordoba scarlet blackout roller blind is a bright red tone, just like a ripe tomato or fiery chilli.

products.title: Dartford Blackout Platinum Roller Blind
products.description: Think of platinum and you think premium. And that's exactly how what comes to mind with this dartford platinum roller blind, without the premium price tag.
